title: Lucy Simon, Singer and Broadway Composer, Is Dead at 82
description: She and her sister Carly Simon were a folk duo in the 1960s. Years later, she wrote the Tony-nominated music for “The Secret Garden.”
dc:creator: Neil Genzlinger
media:description: Lucy Simon in 1982. Her younger sister, Carly, became a best-selling pop star after their folk-duo days, and her older sister, Joanna, was an opera singer. Joanna died a day before Lucy’s death.
